On September 27–28, in the village of Peshtani, take part in one of the four races offered by Peshtani Vertical & Trail: VERTICAL 5km – 5 kilometers with approximately 1,150 meters of elevation gain. description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant sounds of Fuzija, where diverse musical styles blend into an unforgettable evening of artistic fusion. Set in the heart of Ohrid's historic center, this performance brings together innovative musical expressions that transcend traditional boundaries, creating a unique sonic landscape under the summer night sky.

Experience the mesmerizing underwater-themed art exhibition "VEZHDZA" by NC Aquatek, showcasing innovative artistic interpretations that blend aquatic elements with contemporary expression. Set against the backdrop of Ohrid's historic center, this exhibition transforms the space in front of H.Palace into an immersive gallery that explores the depths of artistic imagination.

Witness the ultimate test of endurance at the iconic Ohrid Swimming Marathon, starting from the spiritual sanctuary of Saint Naum. Elite swimmers from around the world navigate the pristine waters of Lake Ohrid, following the eastern shoreline past ancient monasteries and hidden beaches. This challenging 30km marathon showcases both athletic excellence and the breathtaking natural beauty of one of Europe's oldest lakes.

Experience the thrill of Lake Ohrid's premier kayaking event as participants paddle the scenic route from Struga to Ohrid. This challenging 15km journey follows the lake's western shoreline, offering spectacular views of the surrounding mountains and historic settlements. Spectators can cheer from various viewpoints along the route while witnessing the determination and skill of kayakers navigating one of Europe's oldest and most beautiful lakes.

Join the excitement at Ohrid's Old Swimming Court for an adrenaline-pumping SUP racing event. Athletes and enthusiasts will navigate their stand-up paddleboards across Lake Ohrid's crystal-clear waters, competing in various categories against the backdrop of the city's historic coastline. Watch as participants showcase their skills and determination, or take part yourself in this unique water sports competition.

Ever dreamed of playing the guitar? Or maybe you already play and want to take your skills to the next level? Here's your chance!

As part of Youth Week 2025, we invite you to join our Summer Guitar School at the Youth Center Ohrid. From August 11th to 15th, starting at 11:00 AM each day, you'll be immersed in five days of music, learning, and inspiration.

This school is perfect for everyone, whether you're a complete beginner or already have some basic knowledge. You'll be mentored by Igor Stefanovski, a certified guitarist and music teacher, who will guide you every step of the way.

The best part? Participation is completely FREE!

Important Details:

When: August 11-15 | 11:00 AM

Where: Youth Center Ohrid (MCO)

Cost: FREE!

Deadline: Spots are limited, so be sure to register by August 8th, 2025.

Join us for an unforgettable night at Shilla Coffee & Bar as DJ M.M. takes over the decks. Experience a perfect blend of music in our artistic atmosphere, where great beats meet creative vibes. A night of pure musical magic in one of Ohrid's most unique venues.
It's the perfect night to relax, enjoy great music, and create some unforgettable memories in a cozy atmosphere. Don't miss this captivating performance!

Prepare to be captivated by her powerful voice and magnetic stage presence as she delivers a performance that will have you singing along to every hit. Join us for a night of incredible energy and unforgettable moments you won't want to miss.

The prestigious European Match Race Cup 2025 begins! Day 1 features the opening ceremonies and initial qualifying rounds, where elite sailing teams from across Europe showcase their tactical prowess in head-to-head match racing. Watch as skilled crews navigate the challenging waters of Lake Ohrid in this exciting format of competitive sailing.

The competition intensifies on Day 2 of the European Match Race Cup. Teams continue through the round-robin phase, where each crew faces off against their competitors in tactical duels. Every race counts as sailors aim to secure their position in the knockout stages.

Day 3 brings the excitement of the quarter-finals and semi-finals of the European Match Race Cup. The competition reaches new heights as the remaining teams battle in intense knockout matches. Witness strategic sailing at its finest as crews fight for a place in the final.

The grand finale of the European Match Race Cup 2025! Watch the culmination of four days of intense competition as the finalists compete for the prestigious title. The day concludes with the medal ceremony and closing celebrations, marking the end of this premier European sailing event on the beautiful Lake Ohrid.

Watch the future stars of swimming compete in Day 1 of the National Youth Swimming Championship! Young athletes from across the country will showcase their talents in various swimming disciplines at the prestigious Open pool 'Atina Bojadzi'. The first day features preliminary heats and qualifying rounds, setting the stage for an exciting competition.

The excitement peaks on Day 2 of the National Youth Swimming Championship! Join us at Open pool 'Atina Bojadzi' for the finals and medal ceremonies. Watch as young swimming talents compete for national titles in their respective age groups and disciplines. Support these promising athletes as they strive for excellence in this prestigious national competition.

eventName: SUP Marathon 33km around a lake - Day 1
description: Embark on an epic Stand Up Paddleboarding adventure around Lake Ohrid! Day 1 of this challenging 33km marathon begins in the picturesque village of Radozhda. Paddlers will navigate the western shoreline of Lake Ohrid, experiencing breathtaking views and testing their endurance in this unique long-distance SUP event.

eventName: SUP Marathon 33km around a lake - Day 2
description: The adventure continues! Day 2 of the SUP Marathon concludes at the beautiful Ljubanishta Beach. Participants will complete their incredible journey around Lake Ohrid, paddling along the eastern shoreline to the finish line. Join us to celebrate these remarkable athletes as they complete this challenging 33km circumnavigation of one of Europe's oldest and most beautiful lakes.

Join us at the Port of Ohrid for an educational adventure that combines sailing instruction with environmental awareness. Learn the fundamentals of sailing while discovering the importance of protecting Lake Ohrid's unique ecosystem. Expert instructors will teach sailing basics while environmental specialists share insights about lake conservation, making this a perfect blend of sport and environmental education.

eventName: Promotin of  recreative divings for kids
description: Bring your children to Pool 'Atina Bojadzi' for an exciting introduction to recreational diving! Professional instructors will guide young participants through basic diving techniques in a safe and fun environment. This event aims to inspire the next generation of divers while teaching water safety and building confidence. Children will learn about diving equipment, basic techniques, and water safety through interactive demonstrations and supervised practice.

Join us at the Old Swimming Court for a unique and meaningful event that combines athletic skill with a message of global unity. Watch as international divers perform spectacular relay dives in a symbolic gesture of peace and cooperation. This event brings together athletes from different nations, demonstrating how sport can transcend boundaries and promote understanding between cultures.

Experience the charm and heritage of Ohrid's maritime culture at the Traditional Ohrid Boat Regatta 2025. As the sun begins to set, watch local crews navigate their traditional Ohrid boats from Cuba Libre to the Small Port in a spectacular display of skill and tradition. This unique event celebrates the region's rich boating heritage and the craftsmanship of traditional Ohrid boat building, passed down through generations.

Witness the power and precision of international rowing at its finest as crews from around the world compete in the International Rowing Regatta Ohrid 2025. The race course stretches from Cuba Libre to the Small Port, offering spectators multiple vantage points to watch these elite athletes demonstrate their strength and teamwork on Lake Ohrid's pristine waters.

Experience the unique blend of Stand Up Paddleboarding and yoga in this serene morning session at the Old Swimming Court. Find your balance and inner peace while floating on Lake Ohrid's calm waters. This innovative workout combines the core strength of SUP with the mindfulness of yoga, creating a truly unique and refreshing experience. Perfect for both beginners and experienced practitioners.

eventName: CUP in Sport Fishing - Cup Hranilka
description: Join us at Grashnica for the prestigious Cup Hranilka sport fishing competition. Watch skilled anglers demonstrate their expertise in the traditional hranilka fishing technique, competing for the coveted trophy on Lake Ohrid's serene waters. This event celebrates the rich fishing heritage of the region while showcasing modern sport fishing techniques.

Challenge yourself at the Ohrid trcaT Aquathlon 2025, a unique multi-sport event combining swimming and running. Starting at Beach K'j Divono and extending along Road Studenchishta, athletes will test their endurance in Lake Ohrid's crystal-clear waters before transitioning to an exciting running course. Experience the thrill of this dynamic race that showcases both swimming prowess and running stamina.

Experience the thrill of competitive sailing at the International Sailing Regatta Ohrid 2025. Day 1 features exciting preliminary races as skilled sailors from around the world navigate Lake Ohrid's pristine waters. Watch as competitors demonstrate their mastery of wind and water in this prestigious event.

The excitement peaks on Day 2 of the International Sailing Regatta Ohrid 2025 with the final races and championship rounds. Join us at Beach K'j Divono to witness the culmination of this prestigious event as sailors compete for victory in the beautiful waters of Lake Ohrid. The day concludes with an awards ceremony celebrating the achievements of all participants.

eventName: Internat. Sailing Training Camp Ohrid 2025 - Day 1
description: Join us for Day 1 of the International Sailing Training Camp at Beach K'j Divono. Experience world-class sailing instruction in the pristine waters of Lake Ohrid. This comprehensive training camp brings together sailing enthusiasts and experts for four days of intensive learning, practice, and skill development.

eventName: Internat. Sailing Training Camp Ohrid 2025 - Day 2
description: Day 2 of the International Sailing Training Camp continues with advanced techniques and practical exercises. Participants will build upon their foundational skills while learning new sailing maneuvers and strategies in the beautiful setting of Lake Ohrid.

eventName: Internat. Sailing Training Camp Ohrid 2025 - Day 3
description: The third day of our International Sailing Training Camp focuses on mastering advanced sailing techniques and weather navigation. Participants will engage in specialized training sessions and practical exercises, further developing their sailing expertise on Lake Ohrid's waters.

eventName: Internat. Sailing Training Camp Ohrid 2025 - Day 4
description: Join us for the final day of the International Sailing Training Camp, where participants will showcase their newly acquired skills in a friendly regatta. This culminating event celebrates the progress made throughout the camp and provides an opportunity to put all learned techniques into practice.

Welcome to the International OWF Swimming Meeting at the prestigious open pool 'Atina Bojadzi'. Watch as swimmers from around the world compete in this premier swimming event, showcasing their speed and technique in various swimming disciplines. The historic Biljanini Izvori venue provides the perfect setting for this exciting competition.

Join us at M'zija for the International Kayak Canoe Regatta 2025, where elite athletes from around the world showcase their mastery of kayak and canoe racing. Watch as competitors navigate Lake Ohrid's pristine waters in a display of strength, technique, and competitive spirit.

Experience the adrenaline and excitement of paddle boat racing at its finest. Red Bull brings you an electrifying competition at Ohrid's historic Old Swimming Court. Watch as competitors push their limits, showcasing speed, skill, and determination in this unique water sport event.

Experience the thrill of competitive waterpolo as veteran athletes showcase their skills and passion for the sport. Watch as teams battle it out in Lake Ohrid's crystal-clear waters, demonstrating that age is just a number when it comes to athletic excellence.

The excitement continues on day two of the International Waterpolo Tournament for Veterans. Join us at the Port of Ohrid to witness the culmination of this thrilling competition, where seasoned athletes demonstrate their enduring love for waterpolo.

They're not myths, though they feel like legends. They don't carry weapons, but voice, color, sound, and movement. Their mission isn't to save, but to awaken. Each one carries a different energy and you'll find them wherever culture is born: on stage, on canvas, in the streets, in conversation, among the people. Their aim is not only to celebrate culture, but to protect the spaces where it grows — streets, squares, conversations, stages, and everyday moments. You'll see them soon. And you'll know when you meet them.

Dive into nine days of sun, water, and non-stop excitement at the Ohrid Water Festival! Experience the perfect blend of thrilling water sports, live music, and community spirit on the shores of the magnificent Lake Ohrid. It's more than a festival—it's a tradition in the making.
longDescription:
The Ultimate Fusion of Sport, Nature, and Community

The Ohrid Water Festival is a groundbreaking project designed to celebrate the breathtaking beauty of Lake Ohrid while showcasing the thrill of water sports. Our mission is to unite all of Ohrid's water-based activities under a single, dynamic brand, creating a premier sports-tourism event that puts our city on the international map.

A Vision for Ohrid

We believe Ohrid deserves a modern, strategic event that honors its iconic lake. The Ohrid Water Festival is our answer—a vibrant, world-class celebration for sports enthusiasts, tourists, and the local community. With the support of our partners, we are poised to become one of the most sought-after destinations for lovers of water, adventure, and good times.

Our Core Focus: Lake, Sports, and People

Our commitment is to the lake's preservation, the promotion of water sports, and the incredible individuals who dedicate their lives to the water. We are building a new tradition that will elevate active tourism in Ohrid, positioning our city as a top European sports destination.

The festival introduces a fresh concept with activities for all ages and interests, divided into three exciting categories:
- Sports: Thrilling competitions and recreational fun.
- Socio-Educational: Engaging workshops, panel discussions, and presentations on healthy living and environmental protection.
- Promotional: Exhibitions and social gatherings with music and entertainment.

Nine Days of Unforgettable Fun

From August 19th to August 27th, get ready for nine days of non-stop action! With over 30 activities planned, every day offers a new adventure. The festival culminates in the legendary Ohrid Swimming Marathon on August 26th, a historic race from St. Naum to the heart of Ohrid.

Eco-Friendly and Olympic Spirit

We are proud to feature Olympic sports that are entirely eco-friendly. This commitment to sustainability and athletic excellence drives our passion to make the Ohrid Water Festival a resounding success for years to come.

description:
Ohrid, get ready for a night of pure energy! The incredibly popular Serbian singer, Barbara Bobak, is making her way to Egoist Beach Bar on July 25th, 2025, and you absolutely don't want to miss it.

Barbara is a true phenomenon in the Balkan music scene, known for her captivating stage presence and a voice that effortlessly blends modern pop with powerful folk influences. From her early days making waves with covers to her own massive hits like "Sad Malo Pati" and "Duplo Gora," she's captured the hearts of fans across the region. She's got that special something that turns any performance into a full-blown party, earning her the nickname "Queen of Parties."

So clear your schedule, gather your crew, and prepare to sing along to every word and dance until dawn. Barbara Bobak at Egoist Beach Bar promises to be one of those unforgettable summer nights under the Ohrid sky!

Ohrid, prepare for a night of pure fire and rhythm! The sensational Serbian singer and dancer, Tea Tairović, is bringing her electrifying performance to Egoist Beach Bar on July 26th, 2025.

Tea isn't just a singer she's often called the "Shakira of the Balkans" for a reason! With her mesmerizing blend of pop-folk, captivating stage presence, and incredible dance moves (including belly dance and Latin influences), she guarantees a show that will get everyone on their feet. From her breakout hit "Hajde" to tracks like "Dva i dva" and "Balerina," Tea's music is known for its infectious energy and ability to instantly light up any party.

If you're looking for an unforgettable night filled with powerful vocals, dynamic choreography, and the hottest Balkan beats, make sure you're at Egoist Beach Bar for Tea Tairović. It's going to be a summer night you won't soon forget!

Ohrid, brace yourselves for an absolute legend! The one and only Djani is making his way to Egoist Beach Bar on July 28th, 2025, and it's going to be a night unlike any other.

Djani isn't just a singer he's an icon of Serbian turbo-folk, known for his incredible charisma, powerful vocals, and a career spanning decades that has given us countless hits. When Djani steps on stage, you know you're in for a high-energy performance, filled with songs that everyone knows and loves – the kind that get entire crowds singing along, arms in the air. His music is all about good times, heartfelt emotions, and that unmistakable Balkan spirit.

So, get ready to experience the magic of Djani live, by the beautiful lake. This isn't just a concert, it's a celebration, a party, and a chance to make some truly unforgettable summer memories with one of the biggest names in the region!

Get ready, Ohrid, because the stage at Egoist Beach Bar is about to explode with star power! On July 29th, 2025, we're thrilled to welcome the ultimate music power couple: Relja Popović and Nikolija Jovanović!

This isn't just a concert it's a dynamic blend of two distinct, yet perfectly complementary, musical forces. Relja brings that smooth, urban swagger – a master of hip-hop and R&B with infectious beats and lyrics that hit deep. Think "Made in Balkan," "Tuga iz Porschea," and his signature cool. Then there's Nikolija, a true trendsetter and vocal powerhouse, who commands the stage with her fierce energy and genre-bending sound, seamlessly mixing pop, trap, and folk in hits like "Nema Limita" or "Alkohola Litar."

Together, they create an electrifying atmosphere that pushes boundaries and gets everyone moving. Expect a night packed with their individual smash hits, incredible chemistry, and perhaps even a few surprises. If you want to experience the cutting edge of regional music by the shores of beautiful Lake Ohrid, you know exactly where to be. This is going to be epic!

Ohrid, get ready to experience the true meaning of a Balkan spectacle! The one and only queen of pop-folk, Seka Aleksić, is gracing the stage at Egoist Beach Bar on July 30th, 2025, and it's going to be a night of unparalleled energy and hits!

Seka isn't just a singer she's a powerhouse, a fashion icon, and an entertainer who knows exactly how to light up a crowd. With a career spanning decades, she's responsible for countless anthems that have defined generations of Balkan music lovers – from the iconic "Aspirin" and "Crno i zlatno" to her more recent tracks, every song is a guaranteed singalong. Her performances are known for their incredible stage presence, powerful vocals, and a connection with the audience that's truly special.

This is your chance to witness the legend live, under the summer sky by Lake Ohrid. Prepare to dance, sing your heart out, and create memories that will last long after the last note fades. Seka Aleksić at Egoist Beach Bar is more than an event; it's a must-attend experience!

Ohrid, buckle up for an electrifying night! The legendary Aca Lukas is set to bring his undeniable energy and a lifetime of hits to Egoist Beach Bar on July 31st, 2025.

When Aca Lukas steps onto the stage, it's not just a performance – it's an experience. Known as one of the most charismatic figures in Serbian music, he's famous for his raw emotion, powerful vocals, and a knack for creating anthems that resonate deeply with generations. From his iconic "Kafana na Balkanu" to "Pesma od bola" and countless others, his songs are etched into the collective memory of the region. He has a unique way of connecting with the audience, turning every concert into a massive singalong party.

So, if you're ready for a night where the emotions run high, the music hits hard, and the atmosphere is absolutely electric, make sure you're at Egoist Beach Bar. This is your chance to see a true legend perform live, right by the beautiful Ohrid lake. Don't miss it!

Ohrid, prepare for a night that's going to be absolutely on fire with the freshest sounds from the Balkan trap and pop scene! Egoist Beach Bar is thrilled to host the dynamic duo of Nucci & Voyage on August 2nd, 2025.

These two artists aren't just making waves they're creating a whole new tsunami of sound that resonates with a new generation. Nucci brings his signature smooth flow and captivating lyrics, weaving together rap, R&B, and pop into hits that are impossible not to bop your head to. And then there's Voyage, the young maestro known for his unique vocal delivery and contemporary hip-hop vibe, delivering chart-toppers that define the modern Balkan soundscape.

When Nucci and Voyage hit the stage together, it's an explosion of energy, charisma, and undeniable hits like "Gad," "Balkan," "Periferija," and many more that have taken over playlists across the region. This isn't just a concert; it's a statement, a showcase of the cutting edge, and your chance to experience the future of Balkan music, live and loud, right here by the beautiful lake. Get ready to dance until dawn!

Ohrid, prepare for a truly special evening where history and music intertwine! On August 7th, 2025, the magnificent ancient setting of Antički Teatar (The Ancient Theatre) will host a concert by the beloved Macedonian singer, Vlatko Miladinoski.

Imagine the magic: sitting under the starlit Ohrid sky, surrounded by centuries of history in one of North Macedonia's most iconic archaeological sites, as Vlatko Miladinoski's soulful voice fills the air. Known for his authentic interpretations of traditional Macedonian folk and newly composed popular songs, Vlatko brings a warmth and passion to his performances that truly resonate. His music is deeply rooted in the cultural heritage of the region, promising an evening that feels both grand and intimately personal.

This isn't just a concert it's a unique cultural experience, a chance to connect with the heart of Macedonian music in an unparalleled historical ambiance. Come and be part of a memorable night where the echoes of the past meet the melodies of today.
Get ready, Ohrid! The legendary Queen of Balkan music, Lepa Brena, is coming to Stadion Biljanini Izvori for a night you won't forget!
longDescription:
Prepare for an electrifying evening as Brena performs her iconic hits that have soundtracked generations. With her powerful voice and incredible stage presence, she promises a show filled with pure energy and unforgettable moments.

This is your chance to experience the magic of Lepa Brena live, under the Ohrid sky. Whether you're a long-time fan or ready to discover her phenomenal talent, it's a must-attend event!

Don't miss out! Secure your tickets and be part of this spectacular night!

Ohrid, prepare yourselves for an absolutely unforgettable night! This isn't just a party; it's an invitation to immerse yourself in deep, soulful melodies and the perfect summer vibe.

We're beyond thrilled to announce that one of the most iconic artists on the global house & melodic scene is making his way to the heart of Ohrid!

Join us on August 2nd at Rebel Club Ohrid for what promises to be a truly magical evening. Let's make some incredible memories together under the summer sky! Don't miss out!

Get ready, Ohrid! We are absolutely thrilled to announce that the incredible Jelena Rozga, after a string of seven sold-out shows in Belgrade, is finally making her way to our beautiful city!

Imagine this: a magical evening at the ancient Antiçki Teatar, under the starry Ohrid sky, as Jelena's powerful voice fills the air. She'll be joined by a full string orchestra, creating an atmosphere that's truly something special. This isn't just a concert; it's going to be a night filled with pure emotion, from her most heartfelt ballads to those energetic hits that make you want to sing along.

Seriously, you don't want to miss this. It's a rare chance to experience a truly unforgettable musical spectacle right here in Ohrid. Come and be part of a night brimming with passion, amazing music, and memories we'll all cherish!

Ohrid, get ready for something truly special! We're incredibly excited to announce that for the very first time in our magical city, the phenomenal Sergej Ćetković will be performing live.

Mark your calendars for August 3rd, 2025, at 8:00 PM, because under the starlit sky of the Ancient Theater in Ohrid, Sergej will grace the stage, accompanied by the wonderful Bitola Chamber Orchestra.

Prepare for an evening absolutely brimming with his most beautiful ballads, heartfelt emotions, and music that genuinely touches your soul. This isn't just a concert; it's going to be a truly magical experience that we know you'll remember forever. Don't miss out on being a part of this special night!

eventName: DJ Gec & DJ Jaybeats (World Club Mix)

description: Get ready, Ohrid! Omnia Night Club is about to light up with a night dedicated to pure good vibes, as DJ Gec takes the stage! Prepare for an evening packed with all your favorite commercial hits – those irresistible tracks that just make you want to sing along and dance without a care. It's the perfect opportunity to let loose, relive those classic moments, and create new memories on the dance floor right here in Ohrid.

Join us for an unforgettable night at Omnia with DJ Gec, delivering an electrifying set of commercial hits that will keep the dance floor alive all night long. Experience the perfect blend of top chart favorites and dynamic beats in a premier nightlife venue, making it the ultimate destination for music lovers and party enthusiasts alike. Don't miss out on this exclusive event—mark your calendar and get ready to dance the night away with DJ Gec!

Experience an unforgettable night with DJ Estephano at Omnia, as he seamlessly blends the hottest nightlife hits to elevate your evening. Join us for an electrifying performance that promises high-energy beats, vibrant atmosphere, and unparalleled entertainment. Don't miss this exclusive event—perfect for music lovers seeking a dynamic night out in the heart of the city.

Experience an unforgettable night with DJ Oky Doky at Omnia, where the pulsating beats of hip hop and R&B collide to create the ultimate dancefloor atmosphere. Renowned for his dynamic mixes and magnetic presence, DJ Oky Doky will elevate your evening with chart-topping tracks and irresistible grooves. Join us at Omnia for a high-energy event that promises non-stop entertainment, stylish ambiance, and unforgettable memories—your perfect night out awaits!

Don't miss this exclusive event—secure your spot and immerse yourself in the ultimate musical journey at Omnia!

eventName: DJ Gec & DJ Jaybeats (Worldwide Club Mix)
description: Get ready for an unforgettable night at Omnia as DJ Gec and DJ Jaybeats bring the heat to the dancefloor. From high-energy beats to crowd-shaking drops, this duo is set to deliver a night of non-stop music and pure nightlife energy. Join the party, feel the vibe, and dance until late — only at Omnia.

Step into the heart of Ohrid’s nightlife this weekend as DJ Jaybeats takes over Omnia for an exclusive night of high-octane sound and electric atmosphere. Known for his dynamic sets and seamless mixes, Jaybeats brings a signature style that moves crowds and defines unforgettable nights.This is more than just a party — it’s a curated experience for those who live for the rhythm.Omnia. One night. One vibe. Don’t miss it.

Experience the pulse of Ohrid’s nightlife as DJ Gec takes center stage at Omnia. Known for his distinctive sound and crowd-moving energy, DJ Gec delivers a seamless blend of deep beats and dancefloor anthems that ignite the night. This isn't just a set — it's a statement. A night crafted for those who don’t follow the vibe, but create it. Omnia — where the music leads and the city follows. Be there.

From salsa-inspired rhythms to deep tropical house — this is Ohrid’s most soulful night out. Afro. Latino. Sax. One unforgettable night at Omnia.

From deep house to commercial bangers, his sets are designed to keep the crowd moving and the night alive. If you’re looking for flawless transitions, bold beats, and a night that doesn’t slow down — this is it. Omnia presents: DJ Jaybeats. One night. One dancefloor. No limits.

Get ready to lose yourself in an electrifying sonic journey, surrounded by Omnia's world-class production and immersive atmosphere. This is more than just a set it's an unforgettable experience where pulsating beats meet dazzling lights, promising a night of pure exhilaration and non-stop dancing. Dive into the ultimate musical experience with DJ Estephano, truly in Omnia. Get ready for a night where the unexpected is the only constant, and the energy is absolutely boundless. This isn't just a set it's a total immersion.

Looking for a fun and relaxed way to get active? Join the first community run organized by Lychnid Running Society this Sunday, July 13th at 19:00 @ Holandski Park, along the beautiful coast of Lake Ohrid. Open to all ages and fitness levels, this easy-going run is all about movement, connections, and enjoying Ohrid's natural surroundings—no pressure, no pace tracking, just good energy. The event encourages a healthy, active lifestyle and aims to build a supportive local running community. Stick around afterward for some laid-back socializing with fellow runners. Everyone is invited!

Looking for a fun and relaxed way to get active? Join the community run organized by Lychnid Running Society this Sunday, July 20th at 19:00 @ Holandski Park, along the beautiful coast of Lake Ohrid. The event encourages a healthy, active lifestyle and aims to build a supportive local running community. Stick around afterward for some laid-back socializing with fellow runners. Everyone is invited!

Looking for a fun and relaxed way to get active? Join the third community run organized by Lychnid Running Society this Sunday, July 27th at 19:00 @ Holandski Park, along the beautiful coast of Lake Ohrid. Open to all ages and fitness levels, this easy-going run is all about movement, connections, and enjoying Ohrid’s natural surroundings—no pressure, no pace tracking, just good energy. The event encourages a healthy, active lifestyle and aims to build a supportive local running community. Stick around afterward for some laid-back socializing with fellow runners. Everyone is invited!

Breath meets pace. Yoga x Running this Sunday.

To make it even better, this time we'll be joined by @emilijakoloska and @moveandflow.mk for a 30-minute cool-down and full-body stretching and relaxation session.
All in all – energizing running, deep stretching, and complete relaxation right at sunset by Lake Ohrid!

All you need is the desire, good vibes, a smile, and a towel (if you don't have a yoga mat).

🏁 Run starts: 18:30
🏁 Stretching starts: 19:00 @ Voena Plaža (Military Beach)
🫂Combine them however you like!

Неделно трчање 🏃‍♂️ & Нутриционистички муабет 🧁
Sunday Run 🏃‍♂️ & Nutrition Talk 🧁

Придружи ни се и оваа недела на едно посебно издание од нашето неделно трчање! Соработка со нутриционистот Владимир Тодоровски кој ќе нè чекат на целта со совети за исхрана и нешчо слатко 🍓
Join us again this Sunday for a special edition of our weekly run! We're teaming up with the nutritionist Vladimir Todorovski who will be waiting for us at the finish line with expert advice and а healthy treat 🍓

This week, on August 17th, we're joined by the crew that turns streets into starting lines – Ohrid Trchat. They're the heart of the city's races, the team behind the biggest sporting events – and this time, we're running together. When Ohrid Trchat gets moving, the whole city runs. From the lake to the marathon, they know the route, and we bring the energy. Together, we'll make every step count and every kilometer unforgettable. Event Details: Start: 6:30 PM at the Dutch Park. Bring: Good energy, a smile, and your own rhythm – we'll handle the rest together.

Every Ohrid local knows how to make a quick run to Feniks Bakery when the appetite hits. 🥐✨
But this Sunday, we'll earn that appetite after a beautiful 5 km run – and right at the finish line, our friends from Feniks will be waiting. 👟💙

🏃‍♀️ Together we'll run through Ohrid's streets, bringing the energy, the smiles, and the good vibes – and at the end, fresh pastry meets fresh pace.
More than just a run – it's sports, community, and pure enjoyment all in one.

📍 Start – 18:30, Holandski Park
⏱️ 5 km, an easy pace for everyone
🍞 At the finish line – a tasty reward from Feniks Bakery

Looking for a fun and relaxed way to get active? Join the final community run of the series organized by Lychnid Running Society this Sunday, August 31st at 19:00 @ Holandski Park, along the beautiful coast of Lake Ohrid. Open to all ages and fitness levels, this easy-going run is all about movement, connections, and enjoying Ohrid's natural surroundings—no pressure, no pace tracking, just good energy. The event encourages a healthy, active lifestyle and aims to build a supportive local running community. Stick around afterward for some laid-back socializing with fellow runners and to celebrate the summer series. Everyone is invited!

Party with records and thick shade!

This Friday marks the end of the working week under the Murenka with a pleasant breeze, music played on records and sunset! From 18h we will fill the space with quality energy and crispy sound of fresh extanine and cleaned records from the cellar!

📍Location: cafe "pod Murenkana", square, Ohrid
🗓 Date: 11.07.2025 (Friday)
⏰️Time: 18:00-21:00

🌟 Experience the Magic: "Little Stars with Ka Dvojche" 5th Jubilee! 🌟

Join us this Friday, July 18th, at 8:00 PM at "Vangel Naumovski" Square in Ohrid for the 5th annual celebration of young talent and creativity!

🎭 What to Expect:

🎵 A special premiere of "Пеј Охриде" by Marama & Broz, featuring our own Little Stars!

🎤 Heartwarming performances by 25 aspiring vocalists who will steal your heart

🎨 An inspiring art exhibition by Tactus Art School showcasing young artistic talent

🎪 A unique creative performance by the exceptional Nikola Toni

This enchanting evening celebrates culture, creativity, and the bright future of our children. Don't miss this magical celebration of young talent under the Ohrid sky! ✨

Get ready to soak up the sun and groove to the beats with DJ Jaybeats at Park Golden Beach! Your favorite local DJ, renowned for throwing the best parties, is bringing the energy for an epic day party. Join us for an afternoon of incredible music, good vibes, and an unforgettable atmosphere right by the beach. Don't miss out on the ultimate day party experience!

Get ready for an epic day party at Park Golden Beach in Ohrid! We're bringing the heat with DJ Shime, known for electrifying sets and unbeatable vibes. Come soak up the sun, dance to incredible music, and make unforgettable memories by the lake.

Don't miss out on the ultimate summer day party!

Get ready for an unforgettable day at Park Golden Beach in Ohrid! We're thrilled to welcome the talented Elena Ivanovska for a special performance that promises to elevate your afternoon. Join us by the lake for an exquisite ambiance and a truly memorable experience. Don't miss this unique event!

Ohrid's very own DJ Gec, one of the best DJs in town, is coming to Park Golden Beach for an unforgettable day party! Prepare for an electric atmosphere as DJ Gec brings the beats that will keep you moving all afternoon. Don't miss out on this incredible local appearance!

Get ready for an electrifying day party at Park Golden Beach in Ohrid! We're thrilled to host the dynamic Belgrade duo, Divolly & Markward. Known for their incredible energy and infectious house beats, they'll be bringing their signature sound to create an unforgettable afternoon by the lake. Don't miss out on this high-energy summer experience!

Ohrid! Get ready to sing along! The one and only Gjoko Taneski is taking over Park Golden Beach for an epic day party. Known as one of our city's finest voices, his live performance guarantees an afternoon of incredible music and an unforgettable lakeside vibe. This is the event you don't want to miss!

Ohrid's very own DJ Gec, one of the best in the city, is hitting Park Golden Beach for an epic day party! Prepare for an afternoon of electrifying beats and pure energy as this local legend transforms the lakeside into the ultimate dance floor. Don't miss out – let's make some memories!

Join us for a truly special afternoon at Park Golden Beach in Ohrid! We're thrilled to welcome the incredible band, 2Be, for a live performance that will fill your day with the rich sounds of Macedonian music. Immerse yourself in captivating melodies and heartfelt lyrics that tell the stories of our heritage. Come celebrate the soul of Macedonia with 2Be by the beautiful lake!

Prepare for an electrifying day by the lake! Park Golden Beach in Ohrid is thrilled to host a powerhouse lineup of top-tier DJs: Delovski, InvictoZ, Flowzy, and Blu. This incredible collective will be dropping a diverse range of beats, promising an afternoon of non-stop energy and unforgettable vibes. Get ready to dance and experience an exceptional electronic music event!

Prepare for an electrifying day as we welcome a truly world-renowned talent to Park Golden Beach in Ohrid: Mossel! From headlining Ultra Music Festival to playing sold-out arenas across the globe, Mossel brings an unparalleled energy and a masterful blend of electronic and dance music that will ignite the lakeside. This is a rare chance to experience a truly international force on the decks. Get ready to lose yourself in the music and make memories under the sun!

Get ready to immerse yourself in the vibrant sounds of Anna Noodle at a special day party at Park Golden Beach in Ohrid! Hailing from Skopje, Anna Noodle is an electronic music enthusiast known for her upbeat, energetic, and fully expressive sets, blending tech house, afro house, and more. She's played all over North Macedonia and beyond, so prepare for a passionate performance that will have you dancing from start to finish. Come and experience the electrifying vibe she brings to every set!

Ohrid, get ready to move! We're thrilled to welcome back our very own DJ Jaybeats to Park Golden Beach for another unforgettable day party. If you've been to one of his legendary sets, you know the energy he brings! Jaybeats isn't just a DJ he's a true party architect, guaranteed to craft the perfect atmosphere with his infectious beats and incredible selections. Come feel the magic by the lake and let DJ Jaybeats soundtrack your perfect summer afternoon. You won't want to miss the good vibes he creates!

Get ready for an epic day by the lake as Rolling Wheels Prospect Macedonia presents a thrilling Biker Party!

Join us on July 19th, 2025, starting at 13:00h at the scenic Hotel Palas (lakeside) in Ohrid, North Macedonia.

The day is packed with excitement:

Moto Defile: Experience the roar of engines with a spectacular bike parade at 18:00h.

Soundwaves: Groove to the rhythm with "Soundwaves" from 19:30h.

Crossroad Blues Band: Cap off the night with live music from the incredible "Crossroad Blues Band" starting at 22:00h.

Don't miss this high-octane celebration of motorcycles, music, and camaraderie against the beautiful backdrop of Lake Ohrid. It's going to be an unforgettable day!

Sasho Popovski - Guitar
Olivier Samouilan - Viola
 Ivan Bejkov - Double Bass
 Alek Sekulovski - Drums

eventName: Vecer na Starogradska Muzika - ImaT NemaT
description:
Get ready for an evening of unforgettable music, pure emotion, and infectious laughter! One of Macedonia's most beloved music shows, ImaT NemaT, is celebrating its 5-year anniversary with a spectacular gala concert that promises to be the highlight of your summer.

On July 17th, the stunning plateau in front of Hotel Palas – right on Ohrid's iconic promenade – will transform into the ultimate stage for a grand jubilee event, bringing together the nation's finest voices and best vibes!

Prepare to be amazed by over 20 top-tier performers, including:

Elena Velevska

Blagojche Stojanovski – Tushe

Grupa Chardak

Vasilija Petrova

Sanja Zdleral

Dani Daniela

Grupa Oskar

Tashko Karanfilovski

...and many more surprises!

And for a guaranteed dose of humor and infectious spirit, the one and only Zhanko ZS will be there to ensure laughter until your cheeks hurt.

This open-air show will unfold in the magical atmosphere of Ohrid's harbor – a setting so enchanting, it's a reason in itself to be there. Don't miss this landmark celebration of music and joy!

eventName: Prijatelite vo chest na Andrej Labroski
description:
Join us for a special evening dedicated to the memory and honor of Andrej Labroski on July 16th, 2025, starting at 19:00h at Saraishte Beach in Ohrid.

Dear friends, it is with great honor and pleasure that we invite you to be part of this event. Entrance is free, but a donation box will be set up, and the entire amount collected will be donated for the purchase of medical equipment for the pediatric ward at the General Hospital in Ohrid.

As the concert will take place on the beach, please bring your own cushion, towel, or chair for seating.

Sincerely,
VIS Biljana

The sun dipping over Lake Ohrid, casting a golden glow on the ancient town, and in that perfect setting, the timeless melodies of Ohrid come alive.

We invite you to a truly special evening at Restaurant Ana-Marija, where breathtaking panoramic views of the lake and Ohrid town meet the enchanting sounds of Ohridska Calgija.

Lose yourself in the charm of traditional Macedonian songs and beloved old Ohrid classics, performed live with passion and soul. This isn't just music it's a journey into the heart of our rich cultural heritage, delivered in a place that feels like a warm embrace.

Join us for an evening filled with beautiful music, stunning scenery, and that unique, heartwarming Ohrid spirit you'll cherish forever.

Lose yourself in the charm of traditional Macedonian songs and beloved old Ohrid classics, performed live with passion and soul. This isn't just music it's a journey into the heart of our rich cultural heritage, delivered in a place that feels like a warm embrace.

Join us for an evening filled with beautiful music, stunning scenery, and that unique, heartwarming Ohrid spirit you'll cherish forever.

Get ready to groove! Join us at Orevche Beach for a special day party featuring Kristijan Nestoroski. Ohrid's very own old-school DJ master will be on the decks, spinning classic tracks and bringing those unforgettable throwback vibes. Don't miss out on an afternoon of pure musical nostalgia by the beautiful lake!

Get ready to feel the rhythm and soak up the sun! We're absolutely thrilled to welcome the incredible Gentijana Zeneli to Orevche Beach for what promises to be an unforgettable day party.

Known for her vibrant sets and ability to create an electrifying atmosphere, Gentijana brings a unique energy that's simply contagious. Imagine dancing by the beautiful lake, surrounded by good friends and even better music, as she weaves her magic on the decks.

Come find your perfect summer groove and let Gentijana Zeneli soundtrack your most joyful memories at the beach. This is where the good vibes live!

Prepare to be swept away by the artistry of sound! We are thrilled to host DJ Redon Robi at Orevche Beach for an extraordinary day party.

Known for his impeccable taste and, crucially, his masterful and precise mixing technique, Redon Robi doesn't just play music – he crafts an immersive sonic journey. Get ready to experience seamless transitions and a perfectly curated flow that will keep you captivated from the first beat to the last.

Join us by the beautiful lake for an afternoon where every note matters and the music truly takes center stage. This is a must-attend event for anyone who appreciates the finer points of DJing!

Prepare for an immersive musical journey as we welcome the legendary Darko Spasovski to Orevche Beach for an unforgettable day party!

With deep roots in the Macedonian electronic scene and a reputation for spanning genres from soulful house to intricate techno, and the energetic vibes of drum & bass and breakbeat, Darko Spasovski is more than just a DJ – he's a master storyteller behind the decks.

Join us by the beautiful lake to experience his expertly crafted selections and dynamic mixes. Get ready for an afternoon where the music will move your mind, body, and soul. This is a rare opportunity to connect with a true veteran of the scene in the perfect Orevche setting!

Get ready for an explosion of good energy at Orevche Beach! We're thrilled to welcome the dynamic duo, Dado & Mamli, for a day party that's guaranteed to get you moving.

Known for bringing infectious vibes and crafting memorable sets, these two are masters at creating the perfect atmosphere for sun-drenched afternoons by the lake. Whether you're dancing with your feet in the sand or just soaking it all in, Dado & Mamli will ensure the soundtrack to your perfect summer day is absolutely on point.

Join us for an afternoon where the music feels just right, the smiles are contagious, and the good times are endless. Come feel the synergy of Dado & Mamli and make some unforgettable memories!

Get ready for a truly world-class experience under the Ohrid sun! We are incredibly excited to welcome the acclaimed international DJ, Enzo Leep, to Orevche Beach for what promises to be an unforgettable day party.

Hailing from Spain and celebrated globally for his evocative and hypnotic sets, Enzo Leep is a master of weaving together house, electro, minimal, and breakbeat sounds into a seamless, high-energy journey. His reputation for "rock-solid skill" and crafting "kinetic grooves" ensures an afternoon of pure sonic bliss.

This is your chance to dance by the lake to the sophisticated beats of a true global talent. Don't miss this opportunity to immerse yourself in an electrifying atmosphere created by one of the scene's most exciting artists!

We are beyond excited to welcome one of the region's most beloved DJs, the incredible Iva Arifaj, to Orevche Beach for a day party you won't forget.

Hailing from Belgrade's vibrant underground scene and gracing stages at major festivals worldwide, Iva Arifaj is a true master of atmosphere. She'll be weaving a captivating blend of groovy house, deep, hypnotic, and tech house elements, creating that effortlessly cool and utterly infectious energy she's famous for.

Imagine dancing by the beautiful lake, surrounded by friends, as Iva Arifaj crafts the perfect soundtrack to your unforgettable summer day. This is more than just music it's a feeling, a moment, a memory waiting to happen. Don't miss out on the good vibes!

Get ready to soak up the sun and feel the rhythm! We're thrilled to welcome DJ Cobe to Orevche Beach for an afternoon of pure summer bliss.

Known for setting the perfect mood and keeping the energy high, DJ Cobe will be spinning the tracks that make you want to dance, relax, and just enjoy every moment by the lake.

Gather your friends, bring your best mood, and join us for a day filled with fantastic music, great company, and the beautiful Orevche vibes only DJ Cobe can bring. Don't miss this perfect summer escape!

We're thrilled to welcome the fantastic Tommy Tomoski to Orevche Beach for a day party that's all about incredible vibes and unforgettable moments.

Tommy Tomoski is known for bringing that infectious energy and picking just the right tracks to get everyone moving and grooving. Whether you're relaxing in the sun or dancing with your friends, he's guaranteed to create the perfect soundtrack for your summer afternoon.

Join us at the beautiful Orevche Beach and let Tommy Tomoski lead the way to pure summer fun. This is the place to be for amazing music and the best company!

Orevche Beach Transforms: The Sempre Collective Experience Arrives!

Imagine the sun on your skin, the lake glistening, and a wave of perfectly curated sound washing over you. This summer, Orevche Beach is set to host the incredible Sempre collective for a day party that promises more than just music – it promises a complete immersion into the perfect party atmosphere.

Known for their unique selections and ability to craft an unforgettable journey, Sempre will turn the afternoon into a vibrant tapestry of rhythms and grooves. This is your invitation to dance, connect, and make new memories in an unparalleled setting.

Find your rhythm by the water. The ultimate summer vibe is calling.

Prepare for an exquisite musical escape as Orevche Beach hosts a true international talent: Kamilo Sanclemente from Colombia!

Renowned across the globe for his captivating sets and masterful productions, Kamilo Sanclemente is a wizard of progressive house and melodic techno. He crafts soundscapes that are both "dreamy musical voyages" and irresistibly kinetic, blending intricate melodies with driving rhythms.

Imagine the sun setting over the lake, the perfect Orevche vibe, and the distinct, sophisticated sound of one of electronic music's most celebrated artists transporting you. This is a rare opportunity to experience a world-class talent bringing his unique magic to our shores.

Join us for an afternoon that transcends boundaries and celebrates the universal language of truly exceptional music.

Immerse yourself in a wave of vibrant sound as Forty Cats descends upon Orevche Beach for what promises to be an extraordinary day party!

Hailing as a global force in progressive and melodic house, Christina Gavrilova, aka Forty Cats, is celebrated for her ability to weave intricate melodies with deep, infectious grooves. Her sets are more than just music – they are captivating journeys designed to awaken your senses and set your soul free.

Imagine the sun on your skin, the lake shimmering, and Forty Cats crafting the perfect atmosphere, blending her unique "chill and playful energy" into every beat. This is your invitation to dance, dream, and create truly unforgettable summer memories in the most beautiful setting.

Experience the magic. The perfect party awaits you.

Feel the energy building. The shores of Orevche Beach are about to ignite with a powerhouse lineup set to deliver the ultimate day party experience!

Prepare for the undeniable force of Dymo, whose presence alone promises a sonic journey that will captivate and move you. And bringing that quintessential Ohrid heat, our beloved local duo Capee & Manojlovv will be on deck, ready to unleash their signature sounds and keep the vibe absolutely electric.

This isn't just an event; it's a convergence of exceptional talent, ready to create an atmosphere of pure euphoria by the lake. Expect nothing less than seamless mixes, infectious rhythms, and non-stop good times as these artists command the stage.

Claim your spot in the sun. This is where the magic happens. Don't miss this monumental day party at Orevche Beach!

Imagine a perfect summer day unfolding by the lake, soundtracked by artists who truly understand how to set the mood. This season, Orevche Beach welcomes the talented duo of Acosound & Darko for an afternoon of exquisite sound and genuine good vibes.

Acosound is known for crafting deep, atmospheric soundscapes that draw you in, while Darko brings his seasoned touch and versatile selections, ensuring a dynamic and engaging experience for everyone. Together, they promise a seamless flow of music that will move your spirit and enhance every moment by the water.

Join us for an afternoon where the music connects, the atmosphere feels just right, and unforgettable memories are made under the sun. Come experience the combined magic of Acosound & Darko!

Prepare for a truly special musical experience as Orevche Beach welcomes a cornerstone of the Macedonian scene: DJ InDog, Goran Kostovski.

With over 25 years dedicated to independent culture, Goran Kostovski is far more than just a DJ; he's a seasoned sonic storyteller. Known for his deep connection to music and ability to craft a captivating atmosphere, he'll be curating an afternoon by the lake that blends timeless vibes with an unmistakable touch of soul.

Imagine the sun, the lake, and the expertly selected sounds of a true veteran taking you on a unique journey. This is your invitation to share in an afternoon of authentic musical passion and unforgettable moments at Orevche Beach.
